title: All the Weight of Our Dreams: On Living Racialized Autism
description: Delve into poetry, essays, short fiction, photography, paintings, and drawings in the first-ever anthology entirely by autistic people of color, featuring 61 writers and artists from seven countries. The work here represents the lives, politics, and artistic expressions of Black, Brown, Latinx, Indigenous, Mixed-Race, and other racialized and people of color from many autistic communities, often speaking out sharply on issues of marginality, intersectionality, and liberation.  All contributors featured: Amanda Filteau, Angel Alexzandrea McCorkle, Anmei He, Bijhan Valibeigi, Cindy Facteau (Fragmented Perfection), Christopher Tucker, Confessions of a Black Rhapsodic Aspie (COBRA), Daniel Au Valencia, D.
